Join me during this very special discussion and personal experience with my guest Star. She shares her story authentically but with great bravery. episodes.title: Exposed: Walking away from The Potter’s House with Alan Eby
episodes.description:
The Potter's House has received much criticism throughout it’s existence and has been labelled by many as a cult. 

Major areas of criticism include the level of control exerted over its members, the intense level of commitment required, and the shunning and mistreatment of those who have left the church.

The church has been accused of brainwashing its members resulting in the blind following of church beliefs and the division of families.

According to their site they are an International Fellowship of over 3000 “churches” in 130 nations. The churches within The Fellowship are usually known as The Potter's House, The Door or Victory Chapel.

Alan Eby knows firsthand the pain that takes place because he was once one of them.
Birthed into this place during an April conference in Gallup, NM. He soon became a pastor’s kid at only 6 years old. 

He lived almost 30 yrs inside this place that has been branded a cult from professionals that study these type of high control systems. 

He trained diligently to climb up the ladder to become a leader of his own church. The countless hours of non paid work for this place and at the end he says he’s left with so much shame and regret for some of the actions he was persuaded and taught to proclaim and do. 

Today after finally walking away from The Potter’s House after almost 30 years Alan is trying to further his career as an independent artist but says he suffers from feeling so behind then others in this industry because of so much wasted time he gave away to this so called church.

As he continues to heal from his experience inside The Potter’s House Alan hopes by sharing his story that it will bring community and encouragement to others that have walked away from this same place. 

Join me as Alan shares his story with Mandy exclusively on Mandy Speaks Up on Spotify, Apple Podcasts and YouTube!

*You can support Alan on his newfound journey with his art at the links below: 

https://stormdreamer.threadless.com/

*

episodes.title: Christina’s Horror Story-Living inside The Potter’s House Cult
episodes.description:
Christina’s Journey in the potters house began in 2001. But her story is a little different in the fact that she did not choose this “church”. She was married into it. 

After being forced to attend or be homeless, per request of her in-laws. She chose to attend. 

What she experienced in this horrific environment is something you would only imagine watching in a movie on t.v. 

* Viewer discretion is advised. *
From physical violations (emotionally, physically, se*ually) to watching girls as young as 15 yrs old be married off. 
Grooming & manipulation, being isolated from “outsiders”, to witnessing men that had accusations of terrible violations but still being allowed to become “pastors” (cult leaders). And so much more. 

How did she finally escape? 
It wasn’t until she did something that was not allowed that she was able to find the help to take the risk.

Join us as we chat with Christina! 
Find out how she escaped. And how she’s doing now after 12 years involved in a community that still exists today. And May very well be closer to you than you think. 

Interview Streamed on Spotify/Apple, FB, 
& Mandy Speaks Up YouTube channel!

Help resources: https://freedomofmind.com/cult-mind-control/bite-model/
••••National Domestic Violence Hotline https://www.thehotline.org/

episodes.title: 35 yrs later Juanita shares her story-leaving The Door CFM church-San Antonio, Tx
episodes.description:
Just 15 yrs old Juanita Estrada Brown began being love bombed into a church
by the name of 
‘The Door’ Christian Fellowship Church in 
San Antonio, Tx. The year was 1987. But what Juanita didn’t know was this “church” had been in the media for its cult attributes. 
It wouldn’t be until years after she left that she would realize it had in fact been a real cult. 

What started as a knock at the door. A prayer. Invites for ice cream. Would eventually lead to encouragement to become a teen bride. Juanita began to feel something was not right. 

While other teen girls around her were married off. Juanita chose to graduate high school and go to college instead. A decision that perhaps helped her eventually leave that environment in 1995. 

She shares her story exclusively with Mandy on MANDY SPEAKS UP!

—Listen to MANDY’S personal interview about escaping this cult in 2018:
https://open.spotify.com/episode/5DXDQIH8VMVsBkTu51LARQ?si=6kWT2idVT6-MCFognvy04A

—More interviews on my podcast of escaping this church cult: Escaping the Potter’s House-CFM Cult w/ Heather*Part 1* —-
https://youtu.be/LMgb_gz7kjc

—Kicked out for “being gay”. Escaping The Potter’s House Cult
https://youtu.be/0Kgg-XuHyrM

—Walking away from religion or belief system and fear being cursed or going to hell?- Watch my Unthinkable series to help you FIND your own truth here: AM I GOING TO HELL? AM I EVIL? IF I QUESTION GOD OR MY BELIEFS? | Exploring your TRUTH
https://youtu.be/VmK8Jwx0HDQ

episodes.title: Kicked out for “being gay”. Escaping The Potter’s House Cult
episodes.description:
Tyffany(she/her) was only 13 when she became the “perfect” victim to be groomed inside The International Religious Cult named The Potter’s House. This so called church of “love” would end up having Tyffany ostracized for “being gay”. 

After the horrific death of her friend Randi who was also a part of the LGBTQ community in 2016. Tyffany returned for the memorial service of her dear friend. Only to be subjected to the pastor’s public HATE SPEECH on the LGBTQ community. 

She shares her jaw dropping story exclusively on Mandy Speaks Up podcast. 🎙 



Join me on this episode of
MANDY SPEAKS UP with Tyffany!
Kicked out for “being gay”. 
Escaping The Potter’s House Cult.

episodes.title: The Story of The Cult Leader’s Daughter: ⚠️Viewer Discretion is advised⚠️￼
episodes.description:
⚠️Viewer discretion is advised⚠️
⛔️Trigger Warning⛔️ ￼
21:40-22:31 R*pe. (To Skip over this segment)

Angela grew up the daughter of one of the cult leaders in Canada! She became a teen bride inside the cult, as women & daughters are pressured to marry as teenagers. As a teen bride she endured horrific abuse at the hands of her “husband”. After a vicious attack she was told to endure it and stay married. Divorce was worse, they said. She would eventually be obliterated from the community she had ever known. 
Her parents were forced to disown her. 
Angela endured so much pain and has now been diagnosed with CPTSD due to growing up as a “pastor’s kid” and her time in The Potter’s House Cult!
Her story and journey publicly shared exclusively on MANDY SPEAKS UP!

📢📢All interviews and My podcast can be heard also on SPOTIFY & APPLE channel——https://open.spotify.com/episode/5ZiQj0q5UKNZCc58r0lV8E?si=YDbs1hqIQ62MIIxf7lOQIA
